description: Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued by an animist to burst in a flash of light.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued by an animist to leech mana from its targets.
Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been coated by a biomancer's own acid.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued has had a black hole woven into it by a Magus and will unleash it on hit. It is unstable, and the black hole will randomly appear next to an enemy, not always the one it hits.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with raw magic from a Magus to pierce armor.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.

Designed to defeat modern body armor, the Rivtech 5x50mm flechette round features a biodegradable sabot and a single, fin-stabilized penetrator. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
